snippet: Everyone was in place for the hearing in Atlanta immigration court: the Guinean man hoping to stay in the U.S., his attorney, a prosecutor, a translator and the judge. But because of some missing paperwork, it was all for nothing....

headline.main: Texas Town Looks to Tell Story of Mexican Guest Workers
headline.print_headline: Texas Town Looks to Tell Story of Mexican Guest Workers

lead_paragraph: Everyone was in place for the hearing in Atlanta immigration court: the Guinean man hoping to stay in the U.S., his attorney, a prosecutor, a translator and the judge. But because of some missing paperwork, it was all for nothing.
